---
title: Folder Options
categories: []
---

You can customise the Similarity Check for all documents uploaded to this folder. You can use the provided check boxes to exclude specific elements, such as quotes, bibliography, user-defined phrases in the account information section, minor matches, and minor sources. In addition, you can also choose to limit the search to desired repositories. Simply create a new folder and select the criteria you want to apply to the search. 

![Folder options](/public/manuals/ithenticate/ithen_folder_opt.png)
